amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike finding 16 and replaces it with language that outlines TransCanada's recent pipeline safety issues with the Keystone pipeline.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-181 to strike finding 16 and replaces it with language that outlines TransCanada's recent pipeline safety issues with the Keystone pipeline.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 272 (Roll no. 643).
